metadata.title: CVE-2021-47057 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  crypto: sun8i-ss - Fix memory leak of object d when dma_iv fails to map  In the case where the dma_iv mapping fails, the return error path leaks the memory allocated to object d.  Fix this by adding a new error return label and jumping to this to ensure d is free'd before the return.  Addresses-Coverity: ("Resource leak")
